wikipedia_page.main: Marc Phillips (born 8 December 1953) is a Welsh charity manager and former politician.

response: PSF's longest running column is Marc Phillips' "The Vinyl Anachronist" (which began in 1998). The site's most popular article remains "Bad Songs of the Seventies," which was written in 1995 and still generates hate-mail.  A 1997 interviewTuli Kupferberg interview with Tuli Kupferberg was also cited in his obituary in the New York Times.Tuli Kupferberg, Poet and Singer, Dies at 86, July 12, 2010
